attributes.title: Paris Blockchain Week
attributes.description: Greetings from @Paris Blockchain Week and a quick live update of my experience. The #ParisBlockchainWeek brought together blockchain enthusiasts from around the world to discuss the latest trends and developments in the industry.

attributes.title: ITB Berlin
attributes.description: ITB Berlin has been an integral authority in the global travel industry for more than 50 years. Countries, cities, regions, tour operators, booking portals, hotels, and many other service providers from numerous countries will be on site. We from Chain4Travel will also be present at our own exhibition stand. We look forward to the unique chance to meet these many travel players and present our innovative technology solution to this community.

attributes.title: European Blockchain Convention
attributes.description: Deemed the most influential blockchain event in Europe, the European Blockchain Convention is an event we didnt miss in 2023. We were excited to meet 2,500+ web3 enthusiasts and talk about the latest advancements in blockchain technology and the impact it will have on different industries. As a decentralized industry approach, we were excited to introduce Camino as the L1 for the global travel industry.

attributes.title: ETH Denver
attributes.description: The Community Innovation Festival ETH Denver took place from March 2-5. Our colleagues Jhon and Luca opened up the world of travel to the decentralized web3 community. They elaborated on the potential of the L1 for the travel industry as one of the latest advancements in the space.

attributes.title: Blockchain Economy London Summit
attributes.description: We were excited to visit UK's #1 blockchain event, the meeting place for the world's top crypto companies and blockchain entrepreneurs: Blockchain Economy London Summit 2023. It was the perfect opportunity to explore the potential of web3, NFTs, cryptocurrencies, blockchain, and much more.

attributes.title: Travolution European Summit
attributes.description: Looking back at this week, the Travolution.com European Summit was the definite highlight. Many tech topics were discussed - from top tech trends, the Green gap, and AI to the blockchain-powered Web3. Watching the panel pulling apart our predictions for the future was fun! Also, I introduced the Camino Network web3 travel ecosystem we are building with many travel companies worldwide.

attributes.title: Fitur: International Tourism Trade Fair
attributes.description: 8,000+ exhibitors & over 100,000 travel industry professionals and enthusiasts came together in Madrid for Fitur 2023. Our colleagues Jhon Ruiz and Juan Sanchez were on-site, spreading the word about #Camino, the blockchain ecosystem for the travel industry and even presented a new use case.

attributes.title: WTM London
attributes.description: Since 1980, World Travel Market has been an established international institution on the travel trade show landscape, attended by travel professionals from around the world. It was an honor to join the panel on the travel technology stage and discuss the topic of blockchain with other industry experts.

attributes.title: Phocuswright Conference
attributes.description: Phocuswright Conference is a valuable platform for innovative companies empowered to tackle our industry's challenges. We had interesting conversations about web3, blockchain technology for the travel industry, and how Camino will revolutionize the world of travel. See for yourselves.

attributes.title: Token 2049 London
attributes.description: Token2049 in London was impressive. Over 3,000 attendees ​from the global crypto industry met entrepreneurs, investors, developers, industry insiders, and global media-and we were there, too, as the only layer one for the travel industry. We look forward to next year's event.

attributes.title: Fvw Travel Talk
attributes.description: A key question of the Fvw I TravelTalk convention was how new technologies, such as blockchain, are emerging and shaping new ways of working in the industry. We were happy to join these discussions and share some insights about blockchain in travel and real-life use cases on the Camino Network in our keynote speeches and panel discussion.

attributes.title: Token2049 Singapore
attributes.description: Token2049, Asia's largest Web3 conference, comes to an end: 7000+ attendees, 2000+ global companies, and Chain4Travel as the only Layer1 provider for a global travel ecosystem. Click below to read Pablos' impressions and key learnings of Token 2049 in Singapore.

attributes.title: Consensus (by CoinDesk)
attributes.description: Consensus is much more than just another crypto festival. CoinDesk brought together roughly 17,000 crypto enthusiasts and experts discussing the regulatory landscape, web3 and the future of digital assets. Vincent Usbeck, Head of Marketing and Sales, was in Austin and looks back on interesting keynotes, inspiring discussions, and an overall extremely future-oriented environment.

attributes.title: Phocuswright Europe
attributes.description: Under the motto “Fast Forward”, we visited this year’s Phocuswright Event in Amsterdam. True to this motto, we have seen inspiring keynotes, innovative use cases and were able to make new connections within the travel industry. Camino is something that will bring the industry fast forward. We are certain about it. Follow our journey and become part of the travel industry.

attributes.title: VIR Online Innovation Days
attributes.description: The VIR invited for this years’ Online Innovation Days under the motto “Back to the Future” (“Zurück zur Zukunft”). Even two members of the Chain4Travel team held a keynote speech on the topic of Blockchain and Chain4travels' efforts in providing this technology for the travel industry. The time for change in the travel industry is ripe and the solutions are right there.

attributes.title: HSMAday
attributes.description: The Hospitality Sales & Marketing Association Deutschland e.V. consolidates over 1,600 members of the hospitality industry and forms a network of as well as a knowledge pool on all relevant specialist areas. Our Managing Director Daniel Poerschke was there and received overwhelming feedback for his presentation of Chain4Travel’s approach to revolutionize the travel industry.
